#summary the XML server returns - described in detail

= XML reference =

An example of XML returned by get_scores.php with _preview_ parameter:

{{{
  <?xml version="1.0" standalone="yes"?>
<game_scores count="6" error="0">
<score><name>Masha</name><email>tarr83@mail.ru</email><value>3100</value><datetime>2009-03-12 00:00:00</datetime><country_code>Netherlands</country_code></score>
<score><name>Vasilisa</name><email>tarr83@mail.ru</email><value>1200</value><datetime>2009-03-17 00:00:00</datetime><country_code>Netherlands</country_code></score>
<score own="1"><name>Your score</name><email></email><value>1000</value><datetime></datetime><country_code>Netherlands</country_code></score>
<score><name>Petyabik</name><email>tarr83@mail.ru</email><value>500</value><datetime>2009-03-08 00:00:00</datetime><country_code>Netherlands</country_code></score>
<score><name>Sveta</name><email>tarr83@mail.ru</email><value>120</value><datetime>2009-03-10 00:00:00</datetime><country_code>Netherlands</country_code></score>
<score><name>Misha</name><email>tarr83@mail.ru</email><value>100</value><datetime>2009-03-02 00:00:00</datetime><country_code>Netherlands</country_code></score>
</game_scores>
}}}


|| count || the number of records in XML returned ||
|| own="1" || this parameter tells the client which score to highlight as own user's score ||
